name: Escape
text: Any person who escapes from lawful custody in another state while being held pursuant to the Agreement on Detainers may be charged with escape under chapter 740 and sentenced to a term of imprisonment not to exceed three years. [L 1965, c 160, §4; Supp, §250A-4; HRS §714-4; ren L 1972, c 9, pt of §1]
